changelog.change: · fixes unsent message on iG v392 and later
· ipad now supporting natively - the iOS ipa is the same for iPad
· add arabic language if ur language is set to arabic
· more support and better compatibility for v396
· update ipa to newer Instagram v396.0
· fixes follow status in v392.0 and later
· add downloading high quality video (if availble)up to 4k story and reels
· add more ad's removing for explore and other reels section
· add no create to hide creation button
· fixes hide reels on iG v388 and later
· fixes hide explore on iG v388 and later
· fixes following determint iG v388 and later
· fixes downloading from stories on iG v388 and later
· fixes disable auto advance to next stories on iG v380 and later
· fixes show confirm to call video-audio on dm iG v385 and later
· fixes reels Icon to match instagram style on iG v380 and later
· other fixes and improvements
· this version is supporting ios 15.1 and above
· add fully compatibility for iG v392.0 and later
· update ipa to newer Instagram v392.0

descriptionlist.longdescription:
In App Purchase: $3.99

In App Settings:
· To enter the settings, either long press on home button in tabbar or Instagram text logo.
· Download Video from posts, IGTV, Reels, etc. (HD | SD)
· Save Images from posts, Stories, & profiles
· Block all promo ads
· Quick seen/unseen Stories/DM's button
· Keep unsent messages
· Copy various text like comments, descriptions, bios, etc.
· Various confirmation prompts on double tap likes
· And many more settings...


IPA & TrollStore Version?
  • Instructions from here...


    • · OR copy this source and add it to ur source list on Altstore, Esign etc..
    · https://ikghd.site/repo.json

    Refund Policy:
    · Refund accepted if you encounter issues such as safe mode or the tweak not working.
    · Must provide full details about the issue, including photos & crash logs.
    · Change of mind is not accepted; you can see details with photos & videos before buying.
    · If refund is accepted, processing will take 3 to 7 days.
    · Thank you 🤗 & enjoy!


    Subscription | Key & Devices:
    · 1-year subscription (364 days).
    · The key is for 1 device and is transferable.


    Refer to the FAQ page for more info:
  • FAQ page
